wikipedia_page.main: Tristia Adele Harrison (nee Clark, born February 1973) is a British businesswoman, the CEO of TalkTalk Group since May 2017.

response: *Tristia Harrison - Chief Executive Officer TalkTalk Group
*Tristia Harrison (born 1973), British businesswoman, CEO of TalkTalk Group
He is married to Tristia Harrison (née Clarke), CEO of TalkTalk Group since May 2017. They have two sons, and live in west London.
